TopicTitle: Setting maneuver nodes in the tracking station

Articles.Content: I don't know if this has been suggested before, but I just realized it would be a really good idea. It'd allow better planning and make it easier to set up nodes for multiple craft without needing to actually load them.
since nodes save now, i dont see why not. better multi mission planning that way. perhaps a visible count down for eached placed node too?

I can vouch for this.

Perhaps you can do something similar in the Mission Control Room, but that's where you plan the maneuver nodes ahead of time from an orbit you launch into?
